semantic_identifier: [GOLD-107]: Instrument recommendation lifecycle events in Sales_Accelerator (shown/accepted/executed)
title: Instrument recommendation lifecycle events in Sales_Accelerator (shown/accepted/executed)

sections.text: Implement client/server instrumentation to emit the closed-loop telemetry events when a recommendation is displayed, when a rep accepts/applies it, and when an associated action/sequence is executed. Use the canonical event schema from GOLD-106 and ensure each event includes a stable recommendation_instance_id plus required context (segment, rep, motion, account/opportunity, CRM IDs, timestamp). Add basic retry/batching and logging so dropped/invalid events can be detected without blocking core workflows.
